creator: pTech
descriptionHtml: This app contains commentary of the Old and New Testament verse by verse. You can search for texts and copy as well. This is user friendly app with nice UI especially for those who want to dive deeper in the Word of God.
descriptionShort: Commentary of the entire Bible verse by verse.
title: Bible Commentary Verse by Verse
